channel.title: Audio Processing on Evan Matthews
channel.description: Recent content in Audio Processing on Evan Matthews

item.title: DSP Basics
item.description: Introduction Words words words words Waveform We’ll define all sounds imported and exported as waveforms, or arrays of integer or floating-point values that designate the amplitude of a sound for each frame of sound. A single frame of a waveform won’t sound like much, (or anything at all), but when a number of frames are played sequentially, our ears can process the information. References Words Words Words
